title: Amorim agrees with Keane´s Man Utd criticism: We deserve it
description: Manchester United deserve the criticism dealt their way by former captain Roy Keane, so sees Ruben Amorim. United have the chance to salvage not only silverware, but also Champions League qualification, from a hugely underwhelming season, after they beat Athletic Bilbao 7-1 on aggregate over two legs in the Europa League semi-finals. They will take […] The post Amorim agrees with Keane´s Man Utd criticism: We deserve it appeared first on Soccer News.
